snippet: Toronto earned a 7-0 win on aggregate in the home-and-home series and will face Montreal for a spot in the M.L.S. Cup final....
abstract: Toronto FC defeats New York City FC, 5-0, to advance to MLS Eastern Conference finals on aggregate, 7-0.
lead_paragraph: Toronto earned a 7-0 win on aggregate in the home-and-home series and will face Montreal for a spot in the M.L.S. Cup final.

headline.print_headline: Toronto’s Onslaught of Goals Finishes N.Y.C.F.C.’s Season
headline.main: Toronto’s Onslaught of Goals Finishes N.Y.C.F.C.’s Season
headline.content_kicker: Toronto F.C. 5, N.Y.C.F.C. 0 | Second leg | Toronto advances on aggregate, 7-0
